title: Legal Wires
description: Migrated 8000+ posts from WordPress to Ghost CMS with a custom-built theme and AI chatbot integration.
longDescription: As a Freelance Front-End Developer, I developed and deployed a fully custom Ghost CMS theme using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, specifically optimized for SEO, fast loading, and mobile responsiveness. The platform was engineered to scale for 90K+ monthly users, successfully achieving top rankings on Google Discover. I also integrated a real-time AI-powered legal assistant using REST APIs, which increased active interactions and reduced the bounce rate by 24%.
challenges: Optimizing the theme structure for Google Discover visibility and high traffic
Integrating dynamic AI chat features into a static content management system
solutions: Developed a custom, mobile-first theme with advanced meta optimization for SEO
Implemented dynamic routing and live search with external LLM integration via REST APIs

title: Lit Law
description: An AI-powered legal platform built to handle legal queries using Large Language Models (LLMs).
longDescription: Lit Law is a scalable AI-driven web platform tailored for the Indian legal ecosystem. As a Freelance Front-End Developer, I engineered the client-side architecture using Next.js and Redux, featuring a recursive Google-Drive–style document explorer and a collaborative Tiptap editor for real-time contract drafting. I optimized performance through virtualization and lazy loading to support high user concurrency, while ensuring code quality with tools like Husky and Lint-staged.
challenges: Visualizing complex, nested document structures without compromising UI performance
Enabling seamless real-time contract drafting and synchronization for multiple concurrent users
solutions: Engineered a recursive, Google-Drive–style explorer using virtualization and lazy-loading to handle large datasets
Implemented a highly optimized Tiptap editor with collaborative live sync and advanced hydration strategies

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A high-performance personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion to showcase freelance projects.
longDescription: I designed and developed this professional portfolio as a centralized hub to showcase my freelance work and technical expertise. Leveraging Next.js for server-side rendering and superior performance, I engineered a responsive, modern interface using Tailwind CSS. The user experience is elevated through complex, smooth animations and page transitions implemented with Framer Motion, ensuring a seamless journey for recruiters and clients.
challenges: Balancing complex animations with high-performance Core Web Vitals
Creating a scalable component architecture for easy content updates
solutions: Optimized Framer Motion components to ensure non-blocking main thread performance
Implemented a mobile-first responsive design using Tailwind CSS utility classes

title: Sheeksha Tech
description: A responsive school management SaaS architecture with a vibrant, accessible UI built using Next.js and Shadcn UI.
longDescription: In this collaborative project, I led the front-end engineering for Sheeksha Tech, a modern school management SaaS currently in the development phase. My goal was to move the platform away from traditional, rigid ERP designs by engineering a playful, pastel-themed interface using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. I utilized Shadcn UI as the core component library, extensively customizing its primitives to match the brand's 'fun and friendly' identity. The result is a highly responsive, accessible dashboard architecture designed to handle complex administrative workflows and future scalability.
challenges: Heavily customizing the minimalist Shadcn UI system to support a multi-colored, vibrant pastel theme
Ensuring high performance and layout stability for complex, data-heavy dashboard views
solutions: Architected a scalable design token system within Tailwind CSS to override Shadcn defaults without breaking accessibility
Implemented modular dashboard widgets using Next.js server components for optimal loading speeds
